SELECT G.GREEN_ID , G.GREEN_CONTENT , M.MEM_ID , G.GREEN_REG , G.GREEN_MOD , G.GREEN_TAG , G.GREEN_LIKE_CNT , G.GREEN_BOOKMARK_CNT , M.MEM_PIC , M.MEM_NICKNAME FROM GREENTALK G JOIN MEMBER M ON G.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID WHERE 1=1
AND (G.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search.searchKeyword}, '%') OR M.NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search.searchKeyword}, '%'))
AND G.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search.searchKeyword}, '%')
AND M.NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search.searchKeyword}, '%')
ORDER BY G.GREEN_MOD DESC LIMIT #{cri.amount} OFFSET #{cri.startNum}

SELECT G.GREEN_ID , G.GREEN_CONTENT , M.MEM_ID , G.GREEN_REG , G.GREEN_MOD , G.GREEN_TAG , G.GREEN_LIKE_CNT , G.GREEN_BOOKMARK_CNT , GP.GREEN_PIC , M.MEM_PIC , M.MEM_NICKNAME FROM GREENTALK G JOIN MEMBER M ON G.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID JOIN GREENTALK_PIC GP ON G.GREEN_ID = GP.GREEN_ID ORDER BY G.GREEN_LIKE_CNT DESC LIMIT 2

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GREENTALK G JOIN MEMBER M ON G.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID WHERE 1=1
AND ( G.GREEN_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR M.MEM_NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') )
SELECT G.GREEN_ID , GP.GREEN_PIC FROM GREENTALK G JOIN GREENTALK_PIC GP ON G.GREEN_ID = GP.GREEN_ID ORDER BY G.GREEN_REG DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT G.GREEN_ID , G.GREEN_CONTENT , M.MEM_ID , G.GREEN_REG , G.GREEN_MOD , G.GREEN_TAG , G.GREEN_LIKE_CNT , G.GREEN_BOOKMARK_CNT , GP.GREEN_PIC , M.MEM_PIC , M.MEM_NICKNAME FROM GREENTALK G JOIN MEMBER M ON G.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID JOIN GREENTALK_PIC GP ON G.GREEN_ID = GP.GREEN_ID WHERE G.GREEN_ID = #{green_id}
SELECT G.GREEN_ID , GP.GREEN_PIC FROM GREENTALK G JOIN GREENTALK_PIC GP ON G.GREEN_ID = GP.GREEN_ID WHERE GP.GREEN_ID = #{id} ORDER BY G.GREEN_MOD DESC

SELECT M.MEM_NICKNAME , GP.GREEN_PIC , G.GREEN_ID FROM GREENTALK G JOIN MEMBER M ON G.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID JOIN GREENTALK_PIC GP ON G.GREEN_ID = GP.GREEN_ID WHERE M.MEM_ID = #{mem_id} ORDER BY G.GREEN_MOD DESC LIMIT 9

SELECT G.GREEN_ID ,G.GREEN_CONTENT , G.GREEN_REG , G.GREEN_MOD , G.GREEN_LIKE_CNT , G.GREEN_BOOKMARK_CNT , GP.GREEN_PIC , M.MEM_PIC , M.MEM_NICKNAME FROM GREENTALK G JOIN MEMBER M ON G.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID JOIN GREENTALK_PIC GP ON G.GREEN_ID = GP.GREEN_ID ORDER BY G.GREEN_LIKE_CNT DESC LIMIT 6
